div.p: The authoritative source or rules for values supplied in publicationStatus.

The authoritative source or rules for values supplied in publicationStatus within control. If the value "otherPublicationStatusEncoding" is selected an alternate code list should be specified in conventionDeclaration. This optional attribute is available only in control

div.egXML: <ead:control countryEncoding="iso3166-1" dateEncoding="iso8601" languageEncoding="otherLanguageEncoding" repositoryEncoding="iso15511" scriptEncoding="iso15924" publicationStatusEncoding="EASList"> [...] </ead:control>
